channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.
channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: Dr. Frank Turek: Logic, Reason, and the Pagan Delusion [Dead Men Walking Podcast]
item.description:
This week Greg sat down with Dr. Frank Turek. Frank is a best selling author, apologist, radio host, and Founder & President of CrossExamined.org. They discussed the foundation of logic, why apologetics are important to the average christian, what the most insane argument Frank has ever heard from an atheist, and how the secular worldview just doesn't hold up. Frank also sat in for a segment of Fresh 10 with Greg. You'll never believe question five! Enjoy! 

Click here for tickets to the Open Air Theology Conference: "Why Calvinism"

item.title: Braden Patterson Returns! The Complete Hunting Episode! [Dead Men Walking Podcast]
item.description:
This week Greg sat down with Pastor Braden Patterson. They discussed their hunts for deer, black bear, antelope, cougars, coyotes, and bobcats. They talked about their weapon preferences, the discipline in scouting an area to hunt, and the focus and dedication it takes to hone the skills to become a successful hunter. They also talked about how hunting is a good and Godly skill to have for men of all ages. The episode finished up with a Fresh Ten segment to get to know Braden a little more. Enjoy!

Check out Braden on youtube: https://www.youtube.com/@reformedex-mormon4704

Buy one of his custom pipes HERE

Support the show and check out our snarky merch here: http://www.dmwpodcasts.com
